member.name: M:VBScripting.ProgressBar.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: M:VBScripting.ProgressBar.PerformStep
member.summary:
Advances the progress bar one step.
See .

member.name: M:VBScripting.ProgressBar.FormSize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the size of the window.
member.param: Width of the window in pixels.
Height of the window in pixels.

member.name: M:VBScripting.ProgressBar.PBarSize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the size of the progress bar.
member.param: Width of the progress bar in pixels.
Height of the progress bar in pixels.

member.name: M:VBScripting.ProgressBar.FormLocation(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the position of the window.
member.param: The distance of the window in pixels from the left edge of the screen.
The distance of the window in pixels from the top edge of the screen.

member.name: M:VBScripting.ProgressBar.FormLocationByPercentage(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the position of the window.
member.param: The horizontal position of the window from 0 (at the left) to 100 (at the right).
The vertical position of the window from 0 (at the top) to 100 (at the bottom).

member.name: M:VBScripting.ProgressBar.PBarLocation(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the location of the progress bar.
member.param: Distance in pixels of the left edge of the progress bar from the left edge of the window.
Distance in pixels of the top edge of the progress bar from the top edge of the window.

member.name: M:VBScripting.ProgressBar.SuspendLayout
member.summary: Suspend drawing of the window temporarily.

member.name: M:VBScripting.ProgressBar.ResumeLayout(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Resume drawing the window.

member.name: M:VBScripting.ProgressBar.SetIconByIcoFile(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the system tray given an .ico file.
member.param: The filespec of the .ico file. Environment variables are allowed.

member.name: M:VBScripting.ProgressBar.SetIconByDllFile(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the system tray from a .dll or .exe file.
member.param: The path and name of a .dll or .exe file that contains icons.
The index of the icon. An integer.

member.name: M:VBScripting.ProgressBar.FormBorderStyle(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the style of the window border.
member.param: An integer. Return values of one of the seven methods (Fixed3D, FixedDialog, FixedSingle, FixedToolWindow, None, Sizable (default), and SizableToolWindow) of can be used.

member.name: M:VBScripting.ProgressBar.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes of the object's resources.

member.name: P:VBScripting.ProgressBar.Visible
member.summary:
Gets or sets the progress bar's visibility.
A boolean. The default is False.

member.name: P:VBScripting.ProgressBar.Minimum
member.summary:
Gets or sets the value () at which there is no apparent progress.
An integer. The default is 0.

member.name: P:VBScripting.ProgressBar.Maximum
member.summary:
Gets or sets the value () at which the progress appears to be complete.
An integer. The default is 100.

member.name: P:VBScripting.ProgressBar.Value
member.summary:
Gets or sets the apparent progress.
Should be at or above the minimum () and at or below the maximum (). An integer.

member.name: P:VBScripting.ProgressBar.Step
member.summary:
Gets or sets the increment between steps.
See

member.name: P:VBScripting.ProgressBar.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the window title-bar text.

member.name: P:VBScripting.ProgressBar.Debug
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether the type is under development.
Affects the behavior of two methods, if exceptions are thrown. See and

member.name: P:VBScripting.ProgressBar.BorderStyle
member.summary: Provides an object useful in VBScript for setting .

member.name: T:VBScripting.FormBorderStyle
member.summary:
C# enum not intended for use by VBScript.
Corresponds to but not equivalent to System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.

member.name: F:VBScripting.FormBorderStyle.Fixed3D
member.summary: Return value can be cast to an int: 1

member.name: F:VBScripting.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog
member.summary: Return value can be cast to an int: 2

member.summary: Return value can be cast to an int: 3

member.name: F:VBScripting.FormBorderStyle.FixedToolWindow
member.summary: Return value can be cast to an int: 4

member.name: F:VBScripting.FormBorderStyle.None
member.summary: Return value can be cast to an int: 5

member.name: F:VBScripting.FormBorderStyle.Sizable
member.summary: Return value can be cast to an int: 6

member.name: F:VBScripting.FormBorderStyle.SizableToolWindow
member.summary: Return value can be cast to an int: 7
